original:
The term "Sisyphean task" in this context refers to the ongoing efforts to address the consequences of border technologies, which are often criticized for their role in perpetuating violence and restricting the movement of migrants. The metaphor of "spillage" symbolizes the inherent human desire to explore and move beyond established boundaries, reflecting an instinctual push towards uncharted territories.

The movement of the machine,
